description:
It`s school Sports Day, which of course means the arrival of a fearsome, catty alien from outer space! Can Iwata save the Earth from destruction, while avoiding his inevitable Kenny-like fate? Meanwhile, a great hero is reminded of the true strength of youth, and more pointless bilingual puns are presented for your ostensible enjoyment.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attack of the Dark Lord of P.E.!! / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
Taiiku Daimaou Shuurai!!! / Perfect Plate / America Oudan Pascalinglish
体育大魔王 襲来!!! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / アメリカ横断パスカリングリッシュ
